title: 材质的terrain.png部分终于完成，部分效果展示
author: geludan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 geludan 于 2012-10-19 22:55 编辑 

我不会用开光影的方式来迷惑大家，因为你们知道开了光影小房子都无敌了。。所以所有以下截图100%原版无添加，用了之后直接就是这效果！纯天然无添加剂

本材质半真实半涂鸦，在同一个世界遇上写实和幻想的冲击，会有点怪么。。。


实例展示
wood plank

综合效果

stone and cobblestone

卵石，楼梯，红石灯，玻璃综合效果

其他截图

涂鸦作物

砖头楼梯和tnt

综合展示

fancy的树叶

fast的树叶



摆放展示

写实系列
木头，包含原木，木块，楼梯和半木

连我自己都印象深刻的水，岩浆和沙块


其他



涂鸦系列






另：雪块侧面有一些蛋疼，截图后我修了一下



我想说的是我没有用任何高级的材质制作器，直接改的图，所以3d模型都要在改的时候脑子里想象{:10_493:}

最后。。。一大部分terrain.png总算是完成了，不过随之而来的是。。。
particles.pngAll ParticlesThe redstone particles' color cannot be changed.pack.pngThumbnail of pack in texture selection list.Size should be 128x128 pixels.pack.txtOptional description of texture in pack selection list.The text shouldn't be too long or it will not appear./titlepanorama pics, mclogo, black.png, mojang, and splashes./environmentSnow, rain and clouds./fontIn-game font./terrainSun and moon.The image is horizontally flipped in the game. (any words drawn will be backwards until sunset, and then they will be forwards)/itemIn-game models for items such as signs, carts,boats, arrows, and Chests.The doors file is not used./guiItem hotbar, inventory screens, item thumbnails,Minecraft logo and menu background./artAll paintings in game./mobAll mobs in game./armorAll armor in game./achievementThe achievements screen GUI./miscBiome grass/foliage color, overlay for pumpkinhelmets, the clock dial, footprint, explosion particles, and the map background. (Plus a few things you should leave be.)/title/bgMinecraft main menu backgroundNamed panorama0 - panorama5
我不是做材质的料，这货我尽力了，求别喷就行{:10_494:}

replies.author: 52Dora
replies.txt_content: 做材质就是要一个一个地做出来的，我看好你啊
